channel.title: Coding issues
channel.description:
Alright so I fixed my compiler and it works just fine. I can change NPC's, what they drop, shops, etc. etc.
But when I go and try to code things in player.assistant, config, gui, rs interface, and a few other areas I will change it and then compile. Everything goes well up until I attempt to login to my server. It always brings up an error connection message. So I then have to go back and change that area to the way it was before to log back on. I experienced this error a lot and wondered what I'm doing wrong?

item.title: Coding issues
item.dc:creator: @jakerc1 jakerc1
item.description:
@jakerc1 wrote:

Alright so I fixed my compiler and it works just fine. I can change NPC’s, what they drop, shops, etc. etc.

But when I go and try to code things in player.assistant, config, gui, rs interface, and a few other areas I will change it and then compile. Everything goes well up until I attempt to login to my server. It always brings up an error connection message. So I then have to go back and change that area to the way it was before to log back on. I experienced this error a lot and wondered what I’m doing wrong?

Read full topic
